column4: Hi, folks. Ubuntu newbie here. :) Is Ubuntu based 100% on Debian or is it possible to contribute directly to Ubuntu? Background: I'm contributing to Debian but develop a more or less strong dislike for the "human structures" in there. :)
debian just likes to make sure u do things the Debian Way (tm) :)
Debian is currently three words to me: release manager, debian account manager, flamewars
